attributes.additional_details: Ebay to be investigated over its fee it charges its users as the insertion costs and final fees are to high and the user is being ripped off . Also the PayPal fees should be included within eBay as PayPal is owned by the same company and you can't use any other online payment methods . We want the goverment to investigate this if ebay are found guilty over there fees mainly relating to PayPal charges for getting paid for goods then a full back dated refund should be given to the user. Also paypal charge you a fee to send money to a friend or a gift this also needs looking into.
